featured.text: In the health food stores of major cities, it is now possible to buy tofu burgers and even tofu hot dogs.
I’ve tried all kinds of vegan “burgers,” and GreenBurgers are closer to what I’m looking for.
If I wanted to eat a dead cow, I would go for real burgers.
Especially when a burger craving hits…a GreenBurger does the trick.

definition.zh_def: 漢堡，一種由兩片麵包夾著肉餅及其他配料的食品。
definition.en_def: A burger is a food item consisting of a cooked patty, usually made of ground meat, placed inside a sliced bun, often accompanied by various toppings.
definition.example: I ordered a cheeseburger with lettuce and tomato.
